venue.name: Fiserv Forum
venue.address: 1111 Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203

Courtside.Description: Premier seating right next to the action, offering an unparalleled view of the game.
Courtside.View_Quality: Direct court-level view for an immersive game experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Chance to interact with players and be seen on TV.
Courtside.Accessibility: Exclusive entry and premium amenities, including accessibility for all guests.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Access to private lounges, complimentary gourmet food, and personalized service.

Club Seats.Description: Comfortable seating with excellent sightlines and access to exclusive club areas.
Club Seats.View_Quality: Great side court views, ensuring you don't miss any action.
Club Seats.Unique_Features: Luxurious seating and access to private bars and dining areas.
Club Seats.Accessibility: Priority access with convenient elevator service to club level.
Club Seats.Special_Perks: Entry to exclusive club areas, high-end dining options, and in-seat wait service.

Loft Suites.Description: Private suites offering a blend of intimacy, luxury, and panoramic views.
Loft Suites.View_Quality: Elevated and secluded for a private group experience with a wide view of the arena.
Loft Suites.Unique_Features: Personalized catering service, comfortable seating, and a private restroom.
Loft Suites.Accessibility: Dedicated suite level entry with private elevators for an exclusive experience.
Loft Suites.Special_Perks: Top-tier amenities, including access to premium clubs and priority for event booking.

Panorama Club.Description: An exclusive club offering breathtaking views of the court and the city skyline.
Panorama Club.View_Quality: Unique overhead view that captures both the game and the vibrant atmosphere.
Panorama Club.Unique_Features: Access to an outdoor terrace and upscale lounge areas.
Panorama Club.Accessibility: Easy access with premium amenities designed for comfort and convenience.
Panorama Club.Special_Perks: Exclusive club access, gourmet dining options, and specialty cocktails.

restaurants_bars.name: SafeHouse
restaurants_bars.description: An iconic Milwaukee spy-themed hideaway featuring creative cocktails and casual fare in a quirky, dimly lit interior.

restaurants_bars.name: Truth Lounge
restaurants_bars.address: 1111 N. Old World 3rd St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: Great for happy hour or a post-event hang, featuring a small food menu of wings and snacks along with a large list of signature cocktails.

restaurants_bars.name: Turning Tables Tavern & Eatery
restaurants_bars.address: 1040 N. Vel R. Phillips Ave., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: Comfort food with dishes made from house-smoked meats, burgers, wings, and more, supporting a mission to train BIPOC food entrepreneurs.

restaurants_bars.name: Uncle Bucks
restaurants_bars.address: 1125 N. Old World Third St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: Enjoy drinks or a full meal with a modern-industrial-meets-north-woods vibe. Menu options include appetizers, wings, salads, sandwiches, and entrees.

restaurants_bars.name: Whos on Third
restaurants_bars.address: 1007 N. Old World 3rd St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: A low-key sports bar offering wings, cheese curds, craft beer, brats, and burgers.

restaurants_bars.name: 3rd Street Market Hall
restaurants_bars.description: A downtown food hall offering a variety of cuisines, from burgers and custard to arepas, pierogi, tacos, sushi, ramen, and more, with activities available.

restaurants_bars.name: Maders
restaurants_bars.address: 1041 N. Old World 3rd St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: Milwaukee's oldest German restaurant, offering classic German dishes in an Old World atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: The King & I
restaurants_bars.address: 830 N. Old World 3rd St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: A longtime Thai restaurant offering dishes like pad Thai and volcano chicken.

restaurants_bars.name: Oak Barrel Public House
restaurants_bars.address: 1033 N. Old World 3rd St., Milwaukee, WI
restaurants_bars.description: An American Public House serving pub fare with a twist, from tacos and burgers to pizza, complemented by whiskey drinks or craft brew.

accommodations.name: Aloft Milwaukee Downtown
accommodations.address: 1230 N Old World 3rd St, Milwaukee, WI 53212
accommodations.description: A trendy hotel featuring modern rooms with a vibrant social scene at the W XYZ bar. It's within walking distance to Fiserv Forum, offering amenities like a fitness center and indoor pool. The hotel also has pet-friendly policies, making it a great choice for travelers with pets.

accommodations.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Milwaukee Downtown
accommodations.description: Offers spacious suites with separate living areas and small kitchenettes. The complimentary breakfast is a highlight, along with free Wi-Fi and access to a fitness center. Its proximity to the Fiserv Forum makes it an excellent option for those attending events or games.

accommodations.name: Hilton Milwaukee City Center
accommodations.description: An iconic hotel offering elegant rooms and significant historical charm. Amenities include several dining options, a fitness center, and pet-friendly rooms. Its central location provides easy access to Fiserv Forum and other downtown attractions.

accommodations.name: Hyatt Regency Milwaukee
accommodations.description: This upscale hotel features modern rooms with city views, a farm-to-table restaurant, and a rooftop bar. It's conveniently located for guests attending events at Fiserv Forum, offering a shuttle service to nearby attractions.

accommodations.name: The Westin Milwaukee
accommodations.address: 550 N Van Buren St, Milwaukee, WI 53202
accommodations.description: Offers luxurious accommodations with waterfront views, a fitness studio, and on-site dining options. Its serene environment and close proximity to the Fiserv Forum make it an attractive choice for those seeking comfort and convenience.

accommodations.name: Kimpton Journeyman Hotel
accommodations.description: Located in the historic Third Ward, this boutique hotel features stylish rooms, a rooftop bar with city views, and a modern American restaurant. It's a bit further from Fiserv Forum but offers a unique, upscale experience.

tourist_attractions.name: Pabst Theater
tourist_attractions.description: A historic theater known for its opulent interior and diverse lineup of live performances, ranging from music to comedy, just minutes from Fiserv Forum.

tourist_attractions.name: Milwaukee Public Market
tourist_attractions.description: A bustling market offering a variety of local foods, artisan products, and cooking classes, located in the Historic Third Ward, a short drive from the arena.

tourist_attractions.name: Milwaukee RiverWalk
tourist_attractions.description: A scenic walkway along the Milwaukee River, featuring art installations, bars, and restaurants, offering a picturesque view of the city's urban landscape.

tourist_attractions.name: Discovery World
tourist_attractions.description: A science and technology museum that offers interactive exhibits, the Reiman Aquarium, and educational programs, situated on the downtown Milwaukee lakefront.

tourist_attractions.name: Historic Third Ward
tourist_attractions.description: An area known for its vibrant arts scene, shopping, dining, and the Milwaukee Public Market. This neighborhood offers a unique blend of historic industrial architecture and modern living.

team_related_activities.name: Bucks Pro Shop at Fiserv Forum
team_related_activities.address: 1111 Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Milwaukee Bucks merchandise, offering a wide selection of gear located within the Fiserv Forum.

team_related_activities.name: Bucks Game Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: Fiserv Forum, 1111 Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203
team_related_activities.description: Enjoy a full Bucks game day experience with pre-game festivities, live entertainment, and the chance to see Bango, the Bucks mascot, in action.

team_related_activities.name: Milwaukee Bucks Entertainment Block
team_related_activities.address: 1133 N Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203
team_related_activities.description: Adjacent to Fiserv Forum, this area features dining, shopping, and entertainment options, becoming a hub of activity on game days and hosting various fan events.

team_related_activities.name: Bucks Viewing Parties
team_related_activities.description: Join other fans to watch away games at various bars and venues in the Deer District, offering a lively atmosphere with fellow supporters.

options.description: Milwaukee County Transit System (MCTS) offers several bus routes that stop near Fiserv Forum, facilitating easy access from various parts of the city.
The Hop, Milwaukee's streetcar system, has stops that are conveniently located within walking distance to Fiserv Forum, offering an easy way to reach the game.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Bucks tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Bucks tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
